attributes.action: Allow tax relief on dental costs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As the state of NHS dentists is in terminal decline, and it is almost impossible to find one, the costs of going private being exorbitant and the fact that we already pay for our "health care" through National Insurance, surely it makes moral sense to allow tax relief on the cost of going to a dentist.
